1.content:
You were at the grill making some burgers and hotdogs for your summer BBQ that you invited the neighborhood to when your daughter Sam walked up to you.
"Hey dad I'm not feeling the best, I think I'm going to take a nap." She said with a hand on her stomach.
"Ok sweetie, if you need anything let me or your mom know" you said as you flipped some patties. Sam walked inside and up to her room and went to sleep hoping to feel better when she awoke. The party continued for another 30 minutes when suddenly a bright light flashed next door and when you opened your eyes everything was humongous but you didn't see any giant people. You looked around and noticed your wife laying on the ground amd went over to her.
"Hey honey, are you ok?" You asked as you helped her to her feet, still a little dazed.
"Ya I'm fine but what happened?" She asked as she looked around starting to panic.
"I don't know but I think something shrunk everyone" you said as you started calling out names when...
1.title: BBQ turned bad

choices: Decided to hitch a ride on her foot
11.content:
"Dad I'm feeling better" Sam said as she walked outside but didn't see anyone "where'd everyone go? Weird" she walked out and looked around, the back yard was a mess food and paper plates were everywhere, it was like everyone just dropped what they were holding and left. As she turned to walk back inside she stopped and noticed the grill was still on "Dad never leaves this on what's going on" Sam said to herself as she turned it off and headed back inside.
On the ground you and your wife were calling for people when the back door suddenly opened and your giantess of a daughter walked out completely unaware of you and almost crushed you as she walked past to turn your grill off. As she turned to walk back inside you and your wife...
11.title: Better for her, worse for everyone else

choices: You make it with no problems
14.content: A large drop of water the size of a bus landed next to you, pushing you back from the force. As you and your wife looked up you saw storm clouds high in the sky and could see rain starting to fall. As the rain fell near you the water drops threatened to crush you each time as both of you ran for cover. Luckily the back door was cracked open slightly so the both of you were able to get inside to safety, however you think about how many people must be outside still in this monstrous storm. You can see some people in the distance in the kitchen as you walk around and start making yiur way over to them
14.title: Raining

choices: Switch to Bill or Franks search
141.content:
The two of you make it over to the group with no interuptions. When you arrive you notice that it's your nieghbor Bill and his son Steve and your other neighbor Frank. You hear them talking about what happened as they notice you.
"Derek what the heck happened to use?" Bill asked.
"I don't know we were just suddenly tiny like this" Derek said as he motioned to Susan.
"What are we going to do?" Frank said as he kicked at the floor in frustration.
"I think we should try and find everyone and meet up somewhere" Bill said as he looked around for more people "only question is where should we meet up"
"I think somewhere downstairs will be easier since most of them should've been down here when it happened." Derek said
"Ya we'll meet under the couch it seems safe under there until we figure stuff out" Bill said as he pointed to the couch sitting in the livingroom.
"Alright me and susan will head upstairs you three check down here and outside"
"I'll check outside less people out in that rain the better" Frank said as he made his way to the door.
"Alright we'll start directing people to the couch" Bill said as him and Steve walked off. Derek and susan walked to the stairs and started their long journey up them, as they were climbing Derek was thankful his wife convinced him to get carpeted stairs instead of the hardwood ones. As they made it to the top 30 minutes later they started ushering anyone they say to the couch. They came to the split between the different rooms of the upstairs floor. On the left there was the master room amd the upstairs bathroom and on the right was Sam's and Taylor's rooms.

Which room do they check
141.title: Grouped together

14121.content:
Susan wanted to check on Sam since she wasnt feeling well before this happened and said you should start there so you head off to her room and crawl under the closed door. As you enter the room it's very dark and you can barely make out the mess in her room and make a note to have her clean it when your all back to normal. You and Susan head over to the bed climbing over discarded clothes and other miscellaneous objects and reach the sheets. There's enough hanging off that both of you are able to grab on and climb up it and as you reach the top you can make out a dark mountainous landscape.
"Sam must not have shrunk, this is great! She can help us" you shout with glee as you begin making your way over to her head. As you aproach the blanket however she moves her legs and the blanket covers you, sending you into complete darkness but you continue heading up anyways since it should still be a straight shot to her head.
14121.title: Oldest daughter's room

info.brief_description: A family shrinks unbeknownst to the daughter
info.description:
You are Derek. Your throwing a BBQ for your neighborhood when your daughter goes up to her room not feeling well. Soon after she leaves all of the guests suddenly shrink down to a 1/2in due to unknown circumstances.

Derek- 45, father and husband. Very easy going guy.
Susan- 40, your wife. Very protective of her children and would worry about their safety.
John- 18, your son. Sporty jock type. Works out regularly.
Sam- 16, your daughter. Hates bugs but will try not to kill them because of the gross mess they make. Didn't feel well and went up to her room during the BBQ.
Taylor- 8, youngest daughter. She likes to explore and play with her siblings.

Neighbors can be added as the story goes just keep it consistent within story lines.
People can die but try to keep the story going as long as possible and don't make it two sentences, describe it a little.

Gp for good additions
